TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BaseValidatorDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为派生自 类的 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件派生自抽象类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控制是保持为标记源代码，编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 对象为派生自的控件提供设计时支持可视设计器中的类。The objects provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the class in a visual designer. 方法获取用于在设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。The method gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. ## Examples 下面的示例派生`SimpleCompareValidator`控件从类。The following example derives the `SimpleCompareValidator` control from the class. `SimpleCompareValidator` 是一份。`SimpleCompareValidator` is a copy of the . 该示例还从设计器`SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner`从类并使用特性将相关联`SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner`类，该类具有`SimpleCompareValidator`控件。The example also derives the designer `SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` from the class and uses the attribute to associate the `SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` class with the `SimpleCompareValidator` control. `SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` 重写方法，以便绘制实心边框`SimpleCompareValidator`控制在设计时，如果值的控件的属性是或字段。`SimpleCompareValidatorDesigner` overrides the method to draw a solid border around the `SimpleCompareValidator` control at design time if the value of the property of the control is the or field. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/CS/CustomCompareValidatorDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/VB/customcomparevalidatordesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类创建派生自的关联的控件时类或该控件的设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Control CreateViewControl() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateViewControl () As Control

summary.span: 返回要在设计图面上呈现的关联控件的副本。

span.span: Returns a copy of the associated control to render on the design surface.

returns.span: 一个 Web 服务器控件。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果或派生自的关联控件的属性类是一个空字符串 ("")，或者如果属性设置为字段，方法会设置括在方括号 ([])，组中的控件 ID 属性属性字段。If the or property of the associated control that is derived from the class is an empty string (""), or if the property is set to the field, the method sets the property to the control ID, which is enclosed in brackets ([]) and sets the property to the field. 然后调用基方法来生成标记，并还原为其原始值的控件属性，如有必要。The then calls the base method to generate the markup, and restores the control properties to their original values, if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写如果在设计时绘制实心边框关联控件的方法的值的控件属性设置为或字段。The following code example shows how to override the method that draws a solid border around the associated control at design time if the value of the property of the control is set to the or field. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/CS/CustomCompareValidatorDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseValidatorDesigner/VB/customcomparevalidatordesigner.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 一个集合，该集合实现已添加和隐藏属性的 。

span.span: A collection that implements the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 由设计器用来在属性网格中移除或添加属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器对象使用派生自的方法隐藏控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并可以将属性添加到或移除属性的属性网格中的方法。Control designer objects use methods that are derived from the method to shadow control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the properties grid.
